oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Noah's Ark Primitive Baptist Church, 2001 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Noah's Ark Primitive Baptist Church located at 921 Thirtieth Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. This church was rebuilt on the same land in 1967 under Elder R.J. Stevenson, Pastor, according to the cornerstone. The foundation is made of cinderblocks. The exterior walls are a combination of red brick and cinderblock. The roof is gabled with shingles. The windows and the double doors are made of glass. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Noah's Ark Primitive Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
